lead_paragraph: Dathan Ritzenhein, who has claimed a berth on the United States Olympic marathon team, will defend his title in the Healthy Kidney 10-kilometer race in Central Park on May 17. The field also includes the 2006 New York City Marathon champion Marilson Gomes dos Santos of Brazil. Ritzenhein set the Central Park 10K record last year, in 28 minutes 8 seconds.
